description: Hannah Nance Partlow lettered the Adventure Time: Candy Capers series for BOOM! Studios and has designer credits in over 50 single issues and 15 trades and hardcover comic books.
name: Hannah Nance Partlow

deck: Famous Indian musician and composer who played the sitar.
description: Famous Indian musician most noted for popularizing Indian classical music in the UK and United States. Was awarded two Grammy Awards posthumously. Father of Grammy Award winning artist Norah Jones.
name: Ravi Shankar

deck: Writer who wrote for the cartoon Daria and writes for the Colbert Report
name: Glenn Eichler

description: Italian artist who draws for Top Cow. Currently she is part of the creative team of Ron Marz and Betsy Gonia on Witchblade.
name: Laura Braga

description:
Cary Kelley is the co-creator, principle writer and letterer on the Dynagirl series, creator, co-writer and letterer of its parent title, Fallen Justice and the founder of Red Handed Studios. He lives in Austin, Texas with his wife Victoria and son Logan, enjoying live music, good movies and excellent company, all while nursing a margarita. When he’s not traveling, writing, or producing comics, Cary can be found reading anything he can get his hands on, playing a wide variety of sports, or kicked back in the bean bag enjoying some quiet time with his family. Current projects of note include Totem, The Kansas Hit, Dead Reckoning, 48, and the ongoing Dynagirl series.

Cary is also a freelance letterer, having a fairly large number of credits under his belt, including the ZUDA award winning comic Extracurri​cular Activities, The Trip (Action Lab), Horsemen, The Ascendant, and Signed C (Wayward Raven Media) as well as numerous other comics. He is also currently the principle writer of Freestyle Komic's flagship title Hotshot, the writer of the forthcoming Red Handed Studios graphic novel The Talon Chronicles, and hard at work on at least three novels.

Cary’s Deviant Art account can be found here where he posts random pictures of his wanderings and shows off his attempt at photography.
name: Cary Kelley

deck: Sequential artist specialising in pencilled comic strip pages. Also produces digital inks, charcater concepts and story boards. Currently working on BBC's Doctor Who Adventures for Panini UK.
name: Russ Leach

description: Edward Weiss did the cover to Sizzle 12. A scan of the original cover painting can be seen on the right. It was a part of a group of paintings he did, known as the Modern Venus Series.
name: Edward Weiss
